long bio: I’m Vishmi Bhagya, an aspiring data scientist with a strong background in full-stack development, UI/UX design, and mobile app development. Skilled in Python, R, Java, Kotlin, and the MERN stack, I enjoy blending creativity and technology to build impactful, user-friendly solutions. Currently, my focus is on Data Science projects, exploring data-driven insights and analytical challenges. Beyond coding, I’m a cat lover and fitness enthusiast who values curiosity, adaptability, and contributing to projects that inspire positive change.

projects.title: Open Source Portfolio
projects.description: A clean, responsive, and customizable portfolio template built using the MERN stack, featuring JSON-driven configuration and Tailwind styling.

projects.title: Furniture Manufacturing & Retail System
projects.description: A comprehensive MERN stack application for managing furniture manufacturing processes, including inventory, orders, and production workflows.

projects.title: Travel App UI Design
projects.description: A sleek and modern UI design for a travel booking app, created using Figma, focusing on user-friendly navigation and appealing visuals.

projects.title: SecureBank AI – Credit Card Fraud Detection System
projects.description: A group project for the module FDM focused on building an end-to-end machine learning pipeline for credit card fraud detection. The system includes robust data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model development using algorithms such as Isolation Forest, Random Forest, and Logistic Regression. Achieved strong performance across key metrics including precision, recall, F1-score, and AUC. The solution also incorporates anomaly detection, model evaluation dashboards, and a scalable architecture suitable for banking environments.

projects.title: MintLine – Personal Finance Tracker
projects.description: A mobile application designed to help users track their income, expenses, and savings with a simple and intuitive interface. Users can record transactions, set monthly budgets, analyze category-wise spending, and receive smart notifications. Key features include add/edit/delete transactions, category-wise spending analysis, monthly budget alerts, data persistence using SharedPreferences, internal storage backup & restore, push notifications, and a clean UI/UX with bottom navigation.

projects.title: Fashion Store Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a fashion retail website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. Features included a visually appealing homepage and product catalog, product detail pages with dynamic styling, a simple PHP-based admin panel for product management, responsive design, and interactive features for a smooth user experience.
